snippet: After spending the coming weeks working with her doctors toward a return to the set of "Good Morning America," Ms. Roberts said she has hopes of rejoining the cast next month.
abstract: After spending the coming weeks working with her doctors toward a return to the set of "Good Morning America," Ms. Roberts said she has hopes of rejoining the cast next month.

headline.main: Robin Roberts Plans February Return to 'Good Morning America'
headline.print_headline: ‘G.M.A.’ Host Plans to Return From Medical Leave in February
